sentences.en: " Clouds darken with darkness of rain, Streams pale with pallor of mist . "
sentences.cn: 云青青兮欲雨, 水澹 澹 兮生烟.

sentences.en: " Its four sides darken the Bright sun, Its seven stories cut the grey clouds; "
sentences.cn: 四角碍白日, 七层摩苍穹.

sentences.en: Beautiful. Please tidy up my eyebrows and darken them.
sentences.cn: 做得太漂亮了. 请给我修修眉毛,再画一下.
下次不要再到我家来了.

sentences.en: G : Beautifully done . Please trim my eyebrows and darken them.
sentences.cn: 很漂亮. 请修剪一下我的眉毛,并且染黑.

sentences.en: Go ! And never darken my door again!
sentences.cn: 滾,不许再跨进我的门槛!

sentences.en: Guest: Beautifully done. Please trim my eyebrows and darken them.
sentences.cn: 人客: 做患上好极了. 请把睫毛修一下,再画深一点儿.

sentences.en: Nothing was going to darken his mood today.
sentences.cn: 今天什么都不会影响到他的心情。

sentences.en: Please darken the blue paint with black paint.
sentences.cn: 请在蓝漆里掺上点黑漆.

sentences.en: The evening shadows darkened the room.
The skies darken over both our castles, we must take great care.
sentences.cn: 我们的城堡都阴云密布, 我们必须加倍小心.

sentences.en: The sky began to darken as the storm approached.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨来临时天空变得黑沉沉的。

sentences.en: The sky darkened and a few drops of rain fell.
sentences.cn: 天色变暗，落下几滴雨来。

sentences.en: The title must not be allowed to darken the reader's thoughts.
sentences.cn: 读者务必不要由于这篇短篇故事的名字而在思想上迷惑不解.

sentences.en: Though malice may darken truth, it cannot put it out.
sentences.cn: 恶意可以糟塌真理; 但无法消灭真理.

sentences.en: Thought malice may darken truth, it cannot put it out.
sentences.cn: 恶意虽然会糟蹋真理, 但无法消灭真理.

sentences.en: You can be assured that I will never darken your door again.
sentences.cn: 你放心吧,今后我不会再登你家的门.

words.tran_cn: 黑暗的，深色的；模糊的；无知的；忧郁的
黑暗地；模糊地；阴郁地；秘密地

trans.tran_en: to become dark, or to make something dark
